author: ggregory
msg: [CODEC-125] Implement a Beider-Morse phonetic matching codec. Apply Matthew's patch https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12489569/fixmeInvariant.patch. This patch hoists the l-invariant code out of the loop over l. The d'ortley test input string exercises this branch. The "van helsing" input string should be exercising the alternate branch. Thank you MP!
